[[inst_slli]]
==== SLLI

*Syntax:* slli SrcL, shamt, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Shift Left Logical by register or immediate amount.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_slli.svg[SLLI encoding,width=800]

*Group:* ALU
